title: RIOT 1v1
body: I would like to challenge 3 different Oceania Riot developers, please email me the usernames :D may the best man/woman win.

replies.body:
Do you know what the word "developer" means?
They aren't based in OCE.

Perhaps you just mean Riot staff?

The developers are not based in Oceania.
Also, you are level 9...
I'm a smurf and I want to verse one of the developers near that region.
